descriptions:
['DescriptionThis is one of the many fine properties that Emirates Hills has to offer. What sets itself apart from the crowd are the large rooms flooded with natural light. All the reception rooms have duel aspect ensuring that the natural light is used to its fullest. Coupled with the bi-fold doors to the garden meaning the house can be completely opened up during those glorious winter months taking full advantage of the beautiful garden, pool gazebo and golf course views. This also means when entertaining it can truly be an “inside, outside” event. 
The master suite that comprises a large seating area, sleeping quarters and an expansive bathroom suite gives you the space to while away a sleep Saturday afternoon whilst watching the golfers struggle down the adjacent par 3.
7 bedrooms means ample space for a large family that has frequent guests can be well accommodated. 
•	7 bedrooms (1 x Ground floor bedrooms - 5 x upstairs bedrooms – Master suite)

•	Gymnasium

•	Garaging for 2 cars

title_advert: ['Bespoke and Internationally Interior Designed']
location1: ['Al Naseem Residences CAbu Dhabi, Al Raha Beach, Al Bandar']
descriptions: ['DescriptionThis is a rare opportunity to purchase a bespoke internationally interior designed three bedroom apartment at Al Bandar. Open the door and step into a sophisticated life style with genuine WOW factor. Floor to ceiling glass captures maximum natural light throughout, whilst offering breathtaking endless water views from both the living areas and all bedrooms. The design concept adriotly enhances the waterfront location with the colour palate drawn from sand and sea creating a relaxing indoor/outdoor flow. \xa0Moving outside allows you to appreciate that balconies dont come any bigger than this at Al Bandar. This apartment features the largest kitchen available within these units providing ample working surfaces and storage. A spectacularly commissioned splash back adds a unique feature to this space. Beautifully appointed the powder room completes this open plan living zone.The three bedrooms are separated from the lounge by a door to ensure maximum privacy between the two areas. From this point on the sense of luxury and homeliness are maintained by wall to wall pure NZ wool carpet and plush underlay. Each of the bedrooms are tastefully designed with their own perspective. The first bedroom is decorated with a 3D wall paper and one off paint colour designed specifically for this home. The second bedroom benefits from a custom made daybed (included in the apartment). Retreating to the end of the corridor is the master bedroom with en suite bathroom which has been renovated to include a walk in shower.The apartment is presented for sale with many luxury upgrades and is ready to move in. Viewing is highly recommended for those looking for a place to call home, a home that will impress and stand out from the rest.Properties of this pedigree dont stay on the market for long. Please call to arrange a viewing.']

['DescriptionExclusive With Blue chip Reem Mira 4 Type 3E its 3bed +maid room Villa For sale . Villa is Rented till April 2020 @125000 AED  1 Cheque and Rent is Refundable.
BUA  AREA is  2554 Sqft  Plot Size 3385 SQ ft   Close To  pool and park.
Turf Landscaped Garden.
 Selling price 1.6 net .
Reem is set to become one of the first gated communities in Dubai to house a large central park. Featuring camping facilities, sand surfing, and camel riding trails, Reem is inspired by nature.
Reem community offers a modern interpretation of the soothing charm of the desert oasis. The residential development will feature several residential communities, which will be unveiled in phases. 
Residents will become part of an exotic neighbor hood that features an exclusive desert botanical park, camping facilities, sand surfing and camel riding trails, go karting track, dune buggies, rock climbing wall, and a skate park.
Anchored by a sweeping central park, Reem’s common areas will feature fountains as well as a centre piece water feature. A residents’ club, restaurants and cafes, nurseries and primary schools, dedicated jogging and bicycle paths, a cricket pitch and several football fields, a miniature golf course, and an amphitheatre outdoor cinema are all set within the neighbourhood.
Adding to the leisure choices of residents, Reem development in Dubai is in close proximity to the Arabian Ranches Golf Club, Dubai Polo & Equestrian Club, and Global Village.
Call for more detils zia  +971551276345/+97143951212 BRN 26890 ORN 308']
